scripts.buildx: bun i && turbo test lint build
scripts.devx: cd apps/db && bun supabase stop && bun i && bun supabase start && cd ../.. && turbo run dev --parallel
scripts.devx:web: cd apps/db && bun supabase stop && bun i && bun supabase start && cd ../.. && turbo run dev -F @tuturuuu/web
scripts.devx:calendar: cd apps/db && bun supabase stop && bun i && bun supabase start && cd ../.. && turbo run dev -F @tuturuuu/calendar -F @tuturuuu/web
scripts.devx:rewise: cd apps/db && bun supabase stop && bun i && bun supabase start && cd ../.. && turbo run dev -F @tuturuuu/rewise -F @tuturuuu/web
scripts.devx:upskii: cd apps/db && bun supabase stop && bun i && bun supabase start && cd ../.. && turbo run dev -F @tuturuuu/upskii -F @tuturuuu/web
scripts.devx:famigo: cd apps/db && bun supabase stop && bun i && bun supabase start && cd ../.. && turbo run dev -F @tuturuuu/famigo -F @tuturuuu/web
scripts.devx:nova: cd apps/db && bun supabase stop && bun i && bun supabase start && cd ../.. && turbo run dev -F @tuturuuu/nova -F @tuturuuu/web
scripts.devrs: cd apps/db && bun supabase stop && bun i && bun supabase start && bun sb:reset && bun sb:typegen && cd ../.. && turbo run dev --parallel
scripts.devrs:web: cd apps/db && bun supabase stop && bun i && bun supabase start && bun sb:reset && bun sb:typegen && cd ../.. && turbo run dev -F @tuturuuu/web
scripts.devrs:calendar: cd apps/db && bun supabase stop && bun i && bun supabase start && bun sb:reset && bun sb:typegen && cd ../.. && turbo run dev -F @tuturuuu/calendar -F @tuturuuu/web
scripts.devrs:rewise: cd apps/db && bun supabase stop && bun i && bun supabase start && bun sb:reset && bun sb:typegen && cd ../.. && turbo run dev -F @tuturuuu/rewise -F @tuturuuu/web
scripts.devrs:upskii: cd apps/db && bun supabase stop && bun i && bun supabase start && bun sb:reset && bun sb:typegen && cd ../.. && turbo run dev -F @tuturuuu/upskii -F @tuturuuu/web
scripts.devrs:famigo: cd apps/db && bun supabase stop && bun i && bun supabase start && bun sb:reset && bun sb:typegen && cd ../.. && turbo run dev -F @tuturuuu/famigo -F @tuturuuu/web
scripts.devrs:nova: cd apps/db && bun supabase stop && bun i && bun supabase start && bun sb:reset && bun sb:typegen && cd ../.. && turbo run dev -F @tuturuuu/nova -F @tuturuuu/web
scripts.sb:linkpush: cd apps/db && bun sb:link && bun sb:push
scripts.sb:diff: cd apps/db && bun sb:up && bun sb:diff
scripts.update-all: (cd apps && for dir in */; do echo "Updating apps/$dir..." && cd "$dir" && bun update && cd ..; done) && (cd packages && for dir in */; do echo "Updating packages/$dir..." && cd "$dir" && bun update && cd ..; done)
